Welcome to the Cedar Valley CoderDojo

We are excited that you are interested in learning to program with our dojo. You can learn a little bit more about our dojo by selecting the About option above.

But the simple summary is that CoderDojo makes development and learning to code a fun, sociable experience where the two key rules are:

  1. Be Cool! (Bullying, lying, wasting people's time, and so on is UNcool!)
  2. Be Ferocious!

To get started with our dojo explore these links.

  • Getting Started with Hour of Code - Are you brand new to programming. These overview tutorials from Code.org are great ways to learn a little bit about the basics of coding.
  • Learning to Program in Scratch - Are you ready to explore an actual programming language? Scratch is the first language we will teach and learn in our dojo.
  • Resources - Additional information for parents, students, and mentors.
